internal/config.notes: Pure constants package. All exported constants, regex patterns, file maps, and permission lists well understood.

internal/assets.notes: Embed-based asset access. All exported functions (Template, List, SkillContent, etc.) understood. Plugin version extraction via JSON.

internal/rc.notes: Lazy-loaded singleton via sync.Once. YAML config with env/CLI override chain. All exported accessors understood.

internal/context.notes: Context loading, token estimation (4 chars/token), file summaries. Symlink rejection for security.

internal/crypto.notes: AES-256-GCM with prepended nonce. Key management (generate, load, save). Clean, focused package.

internal/sysinfo.notes: Platform-specific resource monitoring via build tags. Threshold-based alerting. Graceful degradation on unsupported platforms.

internal/drift.notes: Six drift checks: path refs, staleness, constitution, required files, age, entry counts. Report with status computation.

internal/index.notes: Entry header parsing, index table generation between markers, entry block splitting. Pipe escaping in tables.

internal/task.notes: Thin task checkbox parser. Match index constants for capture group access. SubTask detection by indent.

internal/validation.notes: Filename sanitization, path boundary validation, symlink detection. Defensive security functions.

internal/recall/parser.notes: Extensible parser registry. Claude Code JSONL and Markdown parsers. Session matching by git remote/path. Large and complex package.

internal/claude.notes: Thin wrapper over assets for skill listing/content retrieval. Also defines hook/settings types for settings.local.json.

internal/notify.notes: Fire-and-forget webhook. Encrypted URL storage. Event filtering. 5s timeout. Silent on all errors.

internal/journal/state.notes: Journal pipeline stage tracking via JSON. Atomic writes. Stage operations (mark/clear/check). Lock support.

internal/bootstrap.notes: Root command creation, global flags, all subcommand registration. Version injected at build time.

internal/cli/add.notes: Entry append with validation. Task insertion logic (before first unchecked). Index update for decisions/learnings.

internal/cli/agent.notes: Context packet assembly with budget. Cooldown mechanism. Also Noted section for overflow.

internal/cli/compact.notes: Task archival and empty section cleanup. Archive flag for timestamped archival.

internal/cli/complete.notes: Task completion by number, partial text, or full text. Checkbox toggle.

internal/cli/decision.notes: Reindex subcommand for DECISIONS.md index table.

internal/cli/drift.notes: CLI wrapper for drift.Detect(). JSON output, auto-fix support.

internal/cli/hook.notes: Multi-tool config generation. Tool-specific output formats.

internal/cli/initialize.notes: Complex init flow: templates, skills, hooks, settings merge, CLAUDE.md, Makefile.ctx, .gitignore. Idempotent with --force override.

internal/cli/journal.notes: Static site and Obsidian vault generation from enriched journal entries.

internal/cli/learnings.notes: Reindex subcommand for LEARNINGS.md index table.

internal/cli/load.notes: Priority-ordered context assembly with budget. Raw mode bypasses assembly.

internal/cli/loop.notes: Ralph loop script generation. Multi-tool templates (claude, aider, generic).

internal/cli/notify.notes: CLI for webhook notifications. Setup and test subcommands.

internal/cli/pad.notes: Encrypted scratchpad CRUD. File blob support (label:::base64). Merge with content dedup. 64KB blob limit.

internal/cli/permissions.notes: Permission snapshot/restore (golden images). Diff of dropped permissions on restore.

internal/cli/recall.notes: Session history browsing. List/show/export/lock/unlock/sync subcommands. YAML frontmatter export.

internal/cli/serve.notes: Thin wrapper invoking zensical serve. Requires external tool.

internal/cli/status.notes: Context health display. JSON and verbose modes. Token estimation per file.

internal/cli/sync.notes: Codebase reconciliation. Detects undocumented directories, manifest changes.

internal/cli/system.notes: System diagnostics + hidden hook plumbing commands. Adaptive prompt counter. Resource monitoring. Multiple hook subcommands.

internal/cli/task.notes: Task archive (preserve Phase structure) and snapshot subcommands.

internal/cli/watch.notes: Context-update tag parser. Attribute validation per entry type. Stdin/file watching.
